icons.title: Setup Valetudo Icons
icons.description: This will load the custom Valetudo icons for use everywhere in Home Assistant. They can be accessed using the 'valetudo:' prefix. After setup, a refresh might be necessary.

augmentations.title: Setup Augmentations
augmentations.description: This will augment all ValetudoRobots with e.g. the approximated Segment the Robot is currently in.

abort.icons_instance_exists: Valetudo icons are already set up. A refresh might be necessary for them to become visible.
